name: Rustbucket
description:
Made for Triple Trijam 2022!

Programming and Graphics - BlazeLOGC: https://blazelogc.itch.io/

Music - Shaggy Overlord: https://itch.io/profile/shaggy-overlord

A short, 1-level bullet hell made for a game jam! I hope you enjoy the game and please let me know through Fax if it bricks your computer or anything like that.

SharkBuild 1 and 2 are the earlier versions of the game, download Rustbucket_final.zip for the proper game.
